GlyphCache Class Reference

This class manages a cache of glyphs in a render target texture. More...

class  Glyph

Detailed Description

This class manages a cache of glyphs in a render target texture.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef std::map<wchar_t, Glyph> GlyphCache::Glyphs

Member Function Documentation

bool GlyphCache::dynamicCache (  )  const

This method returns whether or not this cache is being used as a dynamic cache, or whether it is using pre-generated data.

Returns:
bool True if dynamic, otherwise false.

float GlyphCache::effectsMargin (  )  const [inline]

const std::string& GlyphCache::fontFileName (  )  const [inline]

const std::string & GlyphCache::fontName (  )  const

const GlyphCache::Glyph & GlyphCache::glyph ( wchar_t  c  ) 

This method returns the glyph for the given wide character.

If the character is not yet in the cache, it adds it synchronously.

Parameters:
c The character to return the glyph for.
Returns:
Glyph Glyph information for the given character.

const Glyphs& GlyphCache::glyphs (  )  const [inline]

bool GlyphCache::grabSlot ( GlyphCache::Slot &  slot  ) 

This method returns an available slot in the glyph cache map.

If there are no available slots, then grow the cache.

Parameters:
Slot reference to output Slot structure
Returns:
bool Whether or not a slot was available

float GlyphCache::heightPixels (  )  const [inline]

bool GlyphCache::load ( const std::string &  fontFileName,
DataSectionPtr  pSection 
)

This method loads the font information from an xml file, and optionally precaches some glyphs.

For information aboout the XML font file grammar, please see the File Grammar Guide.

Parameters:
fontFileName Name of the source font, e.g. Heading.font
pSection The data section from a font file.
Returns:
bool True if the font data was loaded successfully.

Parameters:
slot The slot in question.
Returns:
bool Whether or not the slot is currently occupied by a glyph.

bool  state 
)

This method sets the occupied-ness of a given slot.

Parameters:

Moo::BaseTexturePtr GlyphCache::pTexture (  )  [inline]

GlyphReferenceHolder& GlyphCache::refCounts (  )  [inline]

void GlyphCache::refillSurface (  ) 

This method recreates the texture map based on all the existing reference counted glyphs in the cache.

If the cache was initialised from a pre-generated texture, it copies the glyph out of the source texture map.

bool GlyphCache::save ( DataSectionPtr  pSection,
const std::string &  ddsName,
const std::string &  gridName 
)

This method saves the font cache object to the supplied data section.

It is not yet implemented.

Parameters:
dataSection DataSection to save the metrics information to.
ddsName Name for the dds file containing the glyph cache.
gridName Name for the dds file containing the alignment grid.

void GlyphCache::slotToUV ( const Slot &  slot,
Vector2 &  ret 
) const

This method returns the top-left corner of the given slot, in UV coordinates.

Parameters:
slot The slot ot calculate the UV coordinates for.
ret [out] The returned top left UV coordinates.

Slot &  ret 
) const

This method calculates which slot contains the given UV coordinates.

ret [out] The returned slot containing the UV coordinates.
